```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

## Data Import

```{r import}
na_jobtitle <- read_csv("career-opportunities-analysis/data/clean/na_jobtitle.csv")
```

## Data Filtering

```{r filtering}
jobs.of.interest <-
  c("Data Analyst",
    "Data Scientist",
    "Business Analyst",
    "Financial Analyst")
data.of.interest <- na_jobtitle %>%
  subset(Dimension %in% jobs.of.interest, c(Dimension, Month, Value)) %>%
  transmute(
    job = Dimension,
    month = as.Date(zoo::as.yearmon(Month)),
    medianBasePay = Value %>% str_remove_all("[$]|,") %>% as.numeric()
  )
```

## Data Export

```{r}
write_csv(data.of.interest, "data/clean/job-month-pay.csv")
```
